title: #78: Sex, Drugs and Rocket Roll with Jason Louv
description:
Thanks for tuning in for another voyage into the supernatural realms of the world of Magick! Joining us in studio once again is Tin Foil Hat favorite, author Jason Louv. This episode we discuss.....
1) Jason's new book "John Dee and The Empire Of Angels" which is available for preorder now at JohnDee007.com!
2)The Tin Foil Hat Comedy Night live at June 1st at the Comedy Club in San Francisco and June 2nd at the Sacramento Punchline.
3)John Whiteside "Jack" Parsons born Marvel Whiteside Parsons
4)The Suicide Squad
5)Gnostic Mass
6)Thelema​ & The Beast​
7) Aleister Crowley
8) L. Ron Hubbard
9) Babalon Working
10) ​The Sad End of Jack
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
